snippet: A impoverished country with a wealth of spirit, culture and history finds itself in the cross currents of problems both local and global. Too much is at stake to let our usual ignorance of Africa thwart an intelligent response to the twin crises of a...
abstract: A impoverished country with a wealth of spirit, culture and history finds itself in the cross currents of problems both local and global. Too much is at stake to let our usual ignorance of Africa thwart an intelligent response to the twin crises of a coup and a rebellion.
